## Our Objectives
The purpose of this vignette is to learn how to estimate trophic position of a 
species using a one-source model based on [Post 2002](). We will use a Bayesian 
framework deployed through [{trps}]() and [{brms}](). Stable isotope data
($\delta$<sup>13</sup>C and $\delta$<sup>15</sup>N) will be supplied to 
the model.


## Load packages 
```{r setup, message=FALSE}
{
  library(brms)
  library(trps)
}
```
